channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: 3 Bed, 2 Bath, 1 Ghost
channel.desc: New real estate agent Anna has a beautiful listing. The only problem: it has a ghost in residence who is convinced she cannot pass over until Anna gets back together with her ex.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Game, Set, Love
channel.desc: Former tennis pro Taylor reluctantly agrees to coach her friend Will for a mixed doubles tournament, only to find there is a lot more to him than she thought.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Finding Love In Saint Lucia
channel.desc: In the jungles of Saint Lucia, an ornithologist and journalist partner up to save an endangered species of bird. As both fall in love with nature, they begin to fall for each other.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Heartstrings Attached
channel.desc: With the promise of an inheritance from her grandfather spurring her, Emma promises to tutor a gifted violinist, unaware her grandfather is playing matchmaker from the grave.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Romantic Rewrite
channel.desc: When a book editor helps a mystery writer add a romantic skew to his novel, their fictional love story falls of the pages and into the real world.

channel.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea must now step in and honour the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince.

channel.title: A Match In Manhattan
channel.desc: When Celeste loses her teaching job, her boss puts her forward for an au-pair job with infamous New York property tycoon Richard Trapp.

channel.desc: After having recurring dreams about a handsome stranger named Michael, Grace is shocked when she bumps into him in real life - but he has no idea who she is.

channel.desc: The beauty editor of a women's magazine persuades a photographer to fake being her boyfriend when her ex gets engaged to somebody else.
